name: Identifiers
examples: Name alias postal address unique personal identifier online identifier IP address email account name SSN driver's license passport

name: Cal. Civ. Code 1798.80(e) categories
examples: Name signature SSN physical characteristics address telephone passport driver's license insurance policy education employment bank account credit card financial information medical information

name: Protected classifications
examples: Age race color ancestry national origin citizenship religion marital status medical condition physical disability mental disability sex sexual orientation gender identity veteran status genetic information

name: Commercial information
examples: Records of personal property products or services purchased obtained or considered purchasing or consuming histories

name: Biometric information
examples: DNA imagery of iris retina fingerprint face hand vein patterns voice recordings identifier templates keystroke patterns gait patterns

name: Internet or network activity
examples: Browsing history search history consumer interaction with website application advertisement

name: Geolocation data
examples: Data locating consumer's physical location or movements over time

name: Sensory data
examples: Audio electronic visual thermal olfactory or similar information

name: Professional/employment information
examples: Title responsibilities experience salary range performance evaluations

name: Non-public education information
examples: Personally identifiable information as defined in FERPA

name: Inferences
examples: Inferences drawn to create profile about consumer preferences characteristics psychological trends predispositions behavior attitudes intelligence abilities
